payment.desc: Manage the payment details and payment history of the workspace where you are given with master authority.

autoPaymentCancelModal.title: Cancel Subcriptions
autoPaymentCancelModal.desc: Please double-check the product plan and subscription you want to cancel.
autoPaymentCancelModal.caution: * If you cancel now you will be able to use the product and services until the remaining period. When automatic payment is canceled all users of the workspace will not be able to use VIRNECT products from the next payment due date. Your product and service data will be kept for up to two weeks. If you pay again within 2 weeks of the scheduled payment date you can use the VIRNECT product with your existing information.
autoPaymentCancelModal.cautionAgree: Agree to the notice on canceling automatic payment
autoPaymentCancelModal.submitDoneDesc: Automatic payment has been cancelled. If you want to maintain the automatic payment you can cancel the "cancellation of the automatic payment" from tomorrow to one day before the expiration date.
autoPaymentCancelModal.cancelRequestCancelDesc: If you cancel the automatic payment cancellation application automatic payment will be resumed.
